ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
nd2reader is a pure-Python package that reads images produced by NIS Elements 4.0+. It has
only been definitively tested on NIS Elements 4.30.02 Build 1053. Support for older versions
is being actively worked on. The reader is written in the pims framework, enabling easy
access to multidimensional files, lazy slicing, and nice display in IPython.
about.summary: Pure Python library for reading NIS Elements ND2 images and metadata

about.description:
nd2reader is a pure-Python package that reads images produced by NIS Elements 4.0+. It has
only been definitively tested on NIS Elements 4.30.02 Build 1053. Support for older versions
is being actively worked on. The reader is written in the pims framework, enabling easy
access to multidimensional files, lazy slicing, and nice display in IPython.
about.summary: Pure Python library for reading NIS Elements ND2 images and metadata

name: nd2reader
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "nd2reader" %}
{% set version = "3.3.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "3f2aed4cca299331c5f6ebc79b900e8d5374b6efe7422c343da7e28db9690d51" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install --no-deps --no-cache-dir -vvv ."

requirements:
  build:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - numpy >=1.6.2
    - six >=1.4
    - xmltodict >=0.9.2
    - pims >=0.3.0
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - numpy >=1.6.2
    - six >=1.4
    - xmltodict >=0.9.2
    - pims >=0.3.0
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=1.6.2
    - six >=1.4
    - xmltodict >=0.9.2
    - pims >=0.3.0

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - nd2reader

about:
  home: https://github.com/rbnvrw/nd2reader
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Pure Python library for reading NIS Elements ND2 images and metadata'
  description: |
    nd2reader is a pure-Python package that reads images produced by NIS Elements 4.0+. It has 
    only been definitively tested on NIS Elements 4.30.02 Build 1053. Support for older versions 
    is being actively worked on. The reader is written in the pims framework, enabling easy 
    access to multidimensional files, lazy slicing, and nice display in IPython.
  doc_url: https://open-science-tools.github.io/nd2reader/
  dev_url: https://github.com/rbnvrw/nd2reader/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rbnvrw
